abstract: The online retailer had a 44 percent increase in revenue, but investors still fled the stock in after-hours trading.
snippet: The online retailer had a 44 percent increase in revenue, but investors still fled the stock in after-hours trading.
lead_paragraph: Investors shrugged off Amazon’s warnings this summer that its third quarter would be weak.

headline.main: Amazon Suffers Big Drop in Income
headline.print_headline: Amazon Suffers Big Drop In Income
